content: the yarn used in this project was called tlc it was before tlc was turned into a brand with red heart and several yarns were included in the line it is a slightly finer weight than tlc lustre but i can t find it on ravelry it s been over a decade and i don t have the information in order to enter it >this pattern is available for free at crochetkim com or by purchasing an ad-free print-ready version here click visit pattern website above or the link for more information below to see the free version
